current.tab_2_text:
Please allow 10 days for your order to arrive. We source products from all over the world to bring you epic offers and the lowest prices. This means sometimes you have to wait a little longer to get your order but it's always worth it!

Returns are easy, simply contact us for a returns number and send your item to our returns centre for fast processing. We'll get you a replacement or refund in a snap!
current.tab_3_text:
Here are 5 more great reasons to buy from us:

   

We Put Our Customers First to us. If it doesn't fit, it breaks, you've changed your mind or for no reason whatsoever simply send it back to us and we'll cheerfully refund you every cent.

Returns are easy, simply contact us for a returns number and send your item to our returns centre for fast processing. We'll get you a replacement or refund in a snap!

In the unlikely event that you find your item cheaper at another online store, just let us know and we'll beat the competitor's pricing hands-down.

We insist that you love everything you buy from us. If you're unhappy for any reason whatsoever, just let us know and we'll bend over backwards to make things right again.
Ordering from Shoptimized is 100% safe and secure so you can rest easy. Your personal details are never shared, sold or rented to anyone either.

settings.quote: This is gold! This is a very important part of the business. If your website isn’t converting your wasting money on traffic!
That being said… The Shoptimized theme is probably my favourite theme out on the market atm. Versatile, lots of customisation options and built with conversions in mind
This is bar-none the best theme I’ve seen to date. It’s fast on mobile AND desktop.
I moved to Shoptimized exactly because it’s faster than what I was on before and needs less apps that slow the whole thing down. It’s even faster than out of the sandbox retina theme.

We do 6-figures a month using Shoptimized. No complaints here. I’ve switched themes at least a dozen times but I always come back to Shoptimized because of its versatility and built-in marketing functions.

I use Shoptimized on all of my stores. I’ve tested a dozen different themes and this one converts the highest and has a lot of features built in so you don’t have to waste money on recurring app fees.

settings.seo_content: The Better Home's mission is to ensure that the one place we call home is absolutely safe. Along with a range of safer home cleaners, The Better Home offers PLA garbage bags, air fresheners, mosquito repellents, and coconut coir scrubs. All our products are free from harmful chemicals, unlike regular cleaners which put us and our loved ones at risk of health hazards.

settings.title: What is
settings.subtitle: ABSORBIA
settings.text: ABSORBIA is an innovative product that keeps your belongings damp-free. It soaks up the excess moisture from its immediate surroundings and collects it as water, preventing all forms of moisture damage. Absorbia’s range of moisture absorbers not only protects your belongings, but also purifies the air in your storage spaces.

settings.faq-answer: ABSORBIA is an innovative product that keeps your belongings damp-free. It soaks up the excess moisture from its immediate surroundings and collects it as water, preventing all forms of moisture damage. Absorbia’s range of moisture absorbers not only protects your belongings, but also purifies the air in your storage spaces.

MOULD & FUNGUS When temperatures and humidity levels rise, mould and fungus flourish causing harm not only to your food and belongings but also to you.

MUSTY SMELLS If a space smells musty, it indicates the presence of mould even if you can’t see it. This is due to poor ventilation and excess moisture. Absorbia removes excess moisture and improves the quality of air.

ALLERGENS Any substance that can cause an allergy is an allergen. Mould and fungus release allergens as mould spores, which trigger allergic reactions such as sneezing, runny noses, rashes and itchiness.

DAY 1 : Remove foil and place ABSORBIA where needed.

DAY 10-15 : Crystals begin to harden with moisture.

DAY 20-25 : A layer of water is visible in the lower compartment.

DAY 45-60 : Crystals from the top dissolves completely and lower compartment is filled with water.

settings.testimonial_description: My wife sat on my head until I ordered this. She is in love with Absorbia, and apparently I like it too specially in the rainy season when it gets a little smelly in house due to partially wet clothes etc. Absorbia works best for cupboard and is good to save your expensive clothes from fungus.

This is a great product specially for cupboards and cars. My car remains fungus free if Abzorbia is kept in the monsoon season of Mumbai :)
One less star because I got one piece defective with the central partition missing.
The negative side to the product is plastic shell. They aren't reusable which is a big negative.
They last for maximum a month in Mumbai rains.

I ordered the pack of three to trial how effective the product is and I'm reviewing after going through them all - it is amazing! I had a minor seepage in my almirah courtesy Indian monsoons and this really helped keep my electronics and leather goods safe in the absence of reliable sunlight to de-humidify clothes. I'll definitely be ordering more for the rest of my house as well!

settings.testimonial_heading: does what nit's supposed to do
settings.testimonial_description: I have been using this to keep my camera dry and so far it is doing a fantastic job, only wish i had thought of this before. I dont know how this would fare when you use it for a bigger container or say a wardrobe but since I use it inside a small container it seems like its gonna last a really long time. No odour, easy to handle.

I have been using Absorbia's various products, for 2 years now. They have been very helpful in managing odour and mold formation, by reducing the humidity in places, you cannot avoid such as, cabinets, wardrobes, near your electronics etc.
I would buy this product again, because it does what it claims.

have been using the refill pouch since last 2 years regularly. It does the job well, removing the dampness from closed spaces quite well. it requires replacement of the refill every 30 days in my case but can work to 4,days depending on the environment. It is the best and cheapest way to keep your home dry. you need to buy the collection container for the first time (it came with its own refill pouch the first time).
one pouch will cover a wardrobe about 5x6x3 ft adequately. for smaller applications such as kitchen shelves or lockers, use their other products.

settings.testimonial_heading: Excellent in capturieng moisture inside cuboard
settings.testimonial_description: Works as advertised, I kept this inside a cupboard where my camera, lenses and batteries are stored. In 10 days, it is already 1/3rd full and is working. Definitely recommended in cupboards in houses with less sunlight and airflow.
I used it for my closets and my camera box. Works very well. I have a hygrometer and i closed spaces, it brings down the humidity significantly! I am regularly buying it these days.

settings.section_content: We recommend which Absorbia products will be right for you, depending on where in your home you face the most amount of moisture.
settings.section_bottom: Click below to see which product you need!
